title: Community Health Center of Danbury

description: Healthcare home for residents of Danbury and the surrounding towns of upper Fairfield County. Address: 8 Delay St Danbury, CT 06810. Phone: 203-797-8330.
cleaned_text: 8 Delay Street Danbury, CT 06810 203-797-8330 Fax: 203-798-8410 Established in 2008, the Community Health Center of Danbury serves as the healthcare home for residents of Danbury and the surrounding towns of upper Fairfield County.
